project

PhishMailerV2

Social EngineeringProjectSQLPythonFlask

idea

Now after a few years since I created PhishMailer I’ve decided that its time for a version 2. However this time it will not be CLI based but instead it will provide a web interface, for two main reasons

  • Easier User Experience
  • I wanted to create something webbased

its still in the early stages however a “prototype” for the interface was created

OverView

Compared to the first version of phishmailer this will have a few upgrades:

  • GUI not cli
  • More templates
  • email spoofing
  • create Targets for easier tracking
  • email open checker
  • mass sender not just spearphishing
  • host phishing pages directly, no need for external
  • create “campaigns”

Interface Prototype

More coming
